name: Crown of Chaos [Demo]
description:
A mysterious quest awaits you... Everything and everyone may not be as they seem. Are dreams truly reality? Or is it the other way around? What seems like an innocent adventure, is there more?        

This is currently a game I have stopped working on, but it may change in the future when I can spend the love and attention it deserves. Please report any bugs or issues you have, or even any suggestions for future progression!
